price: 54. Haddaad muujisaan wax ama qarisaan, hubaal Alle wax walba wuu Og yahay.
arabic: إِن تُبۡدُواْ شَيۡـًٔا أَوۡ تُخۡفُوهُ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: in tub'dū shayan aw tukh'fūhu fa-inna al-laha kāna bikulli shayin ʿalīman
